revision.text: {{also|yígoh}} ==Navajo== ===Etymology=== {{nv-prefixes|yi-prog|3s|∅}} {{nv-link-to-stem|-goh|progressive}} {{nv-link-to-root|-GOʼ|AnO falls|an animate object falls}}. ===Verb=== {{head|nv|verb}} # he/she is [[fall#Verb|falling]] along, is in the course of falling (a person from a height) # it is [[flow#Verb|flowing]] along (a stream of water) ====Usage notes==== This is a progressive verb; it is conjugated only in the progressive mode. ====Conjugation==== {{nv-paradigm|progressive|yi}}. {{nv-verbtable|PROGRESSIVE |yishgoh|yiigoh|deíníigeeh|yígoh|wohgoh|deínóhgeeh|yigoh|deígeeh|joogoh|dajígeeh}} ====Related terms==== * {{l|nv|yigeeh}}
